summary: Salon booking app with photo upload, AI styling, and personalized salon dashboards featuring analytics (sales, bookings, reviews)
architectural_notes: Salon dashboard requires authentication and salon-specific data isolation
Dashboard analytics need aggregation queries for monthly sales and bookings data
Review system integration required for customer feedback display

existing_features.title: Create a new salon-specific dashboard route accessible after salon registration that displays analytics and metrics unique to each salon
Display a line or bar graph on the salon dashboard showing sales per month for the last 12 months with revenue amounts on the y-axis and months on the x-axis
Display a line or bar graph on the salon dashboard showing bookings per month for the last 12 months with booking counts on the y-axis and months on the x-axis
Display customer reviews on the salon dashboard with rating, comment text, reviewer name, and date, sorted by most recent first
Implement authentication and authorization to ensure salon owners can only access their own salon dashboard data and cannot view other salons' analytics

new_feature_requests.summary: Personalized dashboard per salon with sales per month graph
Bookings per month graph in salon dashboard
Customer reviews display in salon dashboard
Add backend data model and query methods to track and retrieve sales data per month for each salon, including total revenue and transaction counts
Add backend query method to retrieve booking counts per month for a specific salon, aggregating appointment data by month
Add backend data model and methods to store and retrieve customer reviews for each salon, including rating, comment text, reviewer name, and timestamp
